      • setGhost

        @Deprecated
public static void setGhost(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                         boolean enable)
        Deprecated. 
        Sets the specified Player's ghost effect. NOTE: Because this method sometimes doesn't work as expected, it is now deprecated. Uses packets. Most likely will be removed.
        Parameters:
        {@link - Player} player who is effected.
        boolean - enable - if the ghost effect is enabled or disabled.

      • getRandomSpawnPoint

        public static org.bukkit.Location getRandomSpawnPoint(double minX,
                                                      double maxX,
                                                      double minZ,
                                                      double maxZ)
        Obtains a "safe" Location between the specified x and z values. Method avoids the following Materials. - Material.LAVA - Material.STATIONARY_LAVA - Material.WATER - Material.STATIONARY_WATER - Material.CACTUS - Material.WEB
        Parameters:
        double - minX - the minimum x
        double - maxX - the maximum x
        double - minZ - the minimum z
        double - maxZ - the maximum z
        Returns:
        A "safe" Location

        public static void registerTeam(Team team)
        Registers a Team to the system. NOTE: All teams that should be available in-game must be registered here.
        Parameters:
        {@link - Team} team - The team to register.

      • addRestrictedItem

        public static void addRestrictedItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Starts keeping track of the ItemStack specified as a "system" item. System items cannot be dropped or moved around.
        Parameters:
        {@link - ItemStack} item - Should not be null.

      • isRestrictedItem

        public static boolean isRestrictedItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Checks if an ItemStack is a restricted/system item.
        Parameters:
        {@link - ItemStack} - The item to be checked. PRECONDITION: Specified ItemStack is NOT null.
        Returns:
        boolean flag (true/false)

        Broadcasts the specified Sound to all online Players. NOTE: Pitch and Volume are 1.0f
        Parameters:
        {@link - Sound} - The sound to broadcast to all players.

      • broadcastMessageAndSound

        public static void broadcastMessageAndSound(java.lang.String msg,
                                            org.bukkit.Sound sound)
        Broadcasts a specified message and Sound to all online Players. NOTE: Pitch and Volume are 1.0f.
        Parameters:
        {@link - String} msg - The string to broadcast to all players.
        {@link - Sound} sound - The sound to broadcast to all players.

      • broadcastMessageAndSound

        public static void broadcastMessageAndSound(java.lang.String msg,
                                            org.bukkit.Sound sound,
                                            float volume)
        Broadcasts a specified message and Sound to all online Players.
        Parameters:
        {@link - String} msg - The string to broadcast to all players.
        {@link - Sound} sound - The sound to broadcast to all players.
        float - volume - The volume AND pitch of the specified Sound.
